name: cosmo-project
description: COSMO Project - Educational Survey and Statistics System

scripts.build: npm run build-docentes && npm run build-acudientes && npm run build-estudiantes && npm run build-stats
scripts.build-docentes: cd form-docentes && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-acudientes: cd form-acudientes && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-estudiantes: cd form-estudiantes && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-stats: cd Stats/frontend && npm install && npm run build
